lines.text: It just occurred to me... I've traveled halfway around the world, at great expense, simply to kill a different kind of bird.
You want to escape, you brave Anglais? Mean, bad Indian out there! Cut off everything! Zip! Zip! Zip!
[points to his groin, with an evil smile]
Lucky for you, chief like angry. You yell, make strong. Until winter comes!

[translating for Thorn Rose]
No hole in moccasin... she tell you she is a virgin.
I have no reason to doubt it.

[Explaining to John Morgan the need to undergo the painful Sun Vow ritual before he can consummate his marriage to an Indian maiden]
If no pain, nothing good is born. Even seed burst to make grass.
